page.title: 05Schools in Coalville:
page.content:
{ Primary Schools}in this area cater for children from the age of 5 to 11. Schools in the area include{Belvoir {Road, Hugglescote County Primary,{All {Saints, St Clares R.C.(Aided)}and {Broomleys Primary School.
There is also an 11-14 High School - {Newbridge}and a{Technical College}on Bridge Road. The old{Teachers' Centre on Grange Road as now been turned into a Community Centre for the local church.
The{Adult School,}also on Bridge Road, is used for all types of activities, ranging from plays to rummage sales!!
